subtests.name: Can set 'text-decoration-line' to CSS-wide keywords: initial
Can set 'text-decoration-line' to CSS-wide keywords: inherit
Can set 'text-decoration-line' to CSS-wide keywords: unset
Can set 'text-decoration-line' to CSS-wide keywords: revert
Can set 'text-decoration-line' to var() references:  var(--A)
Can set 'text-decoration-line' to the 'none' keyword: none
Can set 'text-decoration-line' to the 'underline' keyword: underline
Can set 'text-decoration-line' to the 'overline' keyword: overline
Can set 'text-decoration-line' to the 'line-through' keyword: line-through
Can set 'text-decoration-line' to the 'blink' keyword: blink
Can set 'text-decoration-line' to the 'spelling-error' keyword: spelling-error
Can set 'text-decoration-line' to the 'grammar-error' keyword: grammar-error
Setting 'text-decoration-line' to a length throws TypeError
Setting 'text-decoration-line' to a percent throws TypeError
Setting 'text-decoration-line' to a time throws TypeError
Setting 'text-decoration-line' to an angle throws TypeError
Setting 'text-decoration-line' to a flexible length throws TypeError
Setting 'text-decoration-line' to a number throws TypeError
Setting 'text-decoration-line' to a URL throws TypeError
Setting 'text-decoration-line' to a transform throws TypeError
